title: Topic Greetings

steps.label: What is the scientific term for a greeting that involves the use of chemical signals?
Olfaction-based greetings involve detecting pheromones released by others.
Chemical cues can be used to signal friendliness or aggression.

quiz.q: What is the primary function of pheromones in greetings?
